venue.name: Cook and Brown Public House Ltd

item.description:
For March Brunch we'll go to Cook & Brown Public House in Providence.

Check out their website:

http://www.cookandbrown.com/

This is an a-la-carte brunch, not a buffet.  The restaurant changes their menu offerings every week so there is no brunch menu on the website.

They publish their brunch menu on Facebook on Saturday and Sunday mornings around 9:30.  To get an idea of what they serve, you can check out their Facebook postings for the next couple of weekends.

http://www.facebook.com/pages/Cook-Brown-Public-House/409967315386#!/pages/Cook-Brown-Public-House/409967315386?sk=info

Hope you can make it !
item.how_to_find_us: I've made a reservation in my name
item.name: March Brunch - Cook & Brown Public House in Providence
